title: Judith Albino Diversity Scholarship Endowment Fund
description: To provide financial aid at the Anschutz Medical Campus to students studying public health, medicine, dentistry or psychology.  Preference shall be given to students who will contribute to the goal of recruiting a diverse student population.
marketingContent: To provide financial aid at the Anschutz Medical Campus to students studying public health, medicine, dentistry or psychology.  Preference shall be given to students who will contribute to the goal of recruiting a diverse student population.
